Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Have a question about Cascade forks, attachments, or other technologies? Find an answer below or reach out to our team.

[Contact Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/contact-us)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en)

- [General](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-1363652011)
- [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-959989177)
- [Company](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[General](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### General

- [Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3565196443)
- [How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-352949934)
- [What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-491972666)
- [What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3528550685)
- [Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1429131367)
- [How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1385769518)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Certified Used Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/contact-us) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Products

- [Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-585285702)
- [What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-4120159277)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 1,200 rental clamps available.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

[What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-585285702)

6 Months.

[What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-4120159277)

The warranty on remanufactured product is six months following date of installation.

[Company](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2780666271)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/us/en/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

Cascade Smart Solutions provides innovative material handling solutions for forklifts and unmanned automated systems (AGVs).

# Cómo podemos ayudarte?

En un mundo con muchos desafíos logísticos, Cascade ofrece equipos versatiles, horquillas, mastiles y tecnologías relacionadas para mejorar la productividad durante toda la cadena de suministro. Colaboramos con nuestros clientes para suministrar lo que necesitan según sus exigencias y ofrecemos un fiable apoyo local.

[Skip to main content](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#main-content)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz)

# Warranty Support

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz)

- [Product Warranties](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-203944854)
- [Dealers & Customers](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)
- [Exclusions](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

[Product Warranties](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-203944854)

Cascade warrants its products to conform to published specifications as found in its quotations, specification sheets, brochures and price lists.

- [New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)
- [Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)
- [What Cascade Will Do](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1246228752)

[New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

[New Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products)—consisting of attachments, forks, masts, hose reels and genuine Cascade parts—are warranted for 36 months following date of installation.

[Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)

[Cascade Remanufactured products](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured) are warranted for 12 months following date of installation.

[What Cascade Will Do](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1246228752)

Cascade will repair or replace, at its option, any part that a Cascade inspection reveals to be defective in materials or workmanship.

[Dealers & Customers](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

To preserve Cascade's Warranty, Dealers and Customers must carefully follow applicable Cascade Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides when maintaining and operating Cascade equipment. Customers must obtain written authorization for repairs or maintenance other than removal or replacement of defective parts.

Unauthorized repairs, modifications, or alterations, use of parts not provided by Cascade, or failure to follow Cascade's Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides will result in loss of Warranty and Customers assumption of all liability resulting from the repair, maintenance, modification or alteration.

**End Users: for information on warranty, installation, or service, contact the nearest authorized Cascade Dealer. For the name of the nearest Dealer or for product information, call** [**+64-9-273-9136**](tel:+64-9-273-9136) **.**

[Exclusions](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

Cascade assumes no responsibility for loss, damage or injury to person or property, or for consequential damages, resulting from the possession or use of its products. Cascade's warranty does not cover wear, tear, abnormal applications, normal or scheduled maintenance.

**THERE ARE NO WARRANTIES EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING ANY WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE WHICH EXTEND BEYOND THOSE STATED IN THIS WARRANTY AND THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION ON THE FACE OF CASCADE'S ORDER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT**.

[Download our Performance+ Warranty Pledge](https://webcdnprd.cascorp.com/import_downloads/6845247_PerformancePledge_EU.pdf)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/contact-us) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Products

- [Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-585285702)
- [What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-4120159277)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 75 rental clamps available in North America.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

[What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-585285702)

6 Months.

[What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-4120159277)

The warranty on remanufactured product is six months following date of installation.

[Company](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2780666271)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/gb/en-gb/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

# Smart Solutions per carrelli elevatori e AGV

Se stai cercando una soluzione rivoluzionaria per la movimentazione dei carichi, non cercare oltre. Le Smart sSolutions Cascade sono facili da integrare nei flussi di lavoro esistenti e intuitive da utilizzare, con una formazione minima richiesta per ottenere una maggiore efficienza.

[Produktgarantien](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-203944854)

Cascade: garantiert die Konformität seiner Produkte gemäß den veröffentlichten Spezifikationen in erfolgten Angeboten, technischen Datenblättern, Broschüren und Preislisten.

- [Neue Produkte](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

[Neue Produkte](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

Cascade Neuprodukte: Anbaugeräte, Schlauchrollen und Ersatzteilen in den ersten 36 Monaten nach der Erstinstallation.

[Wiederaufbereitete Produkte](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)

Cascade Werksüberholte Produkte: unterliegen der Garantie für die ersten 12 Monate nach der Installation.

[Was Wir Tun](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

Cascade Garantieleistungen: Cascade repariert oder ersetzt in eigener Entscheidung jede Komponente, die bei einer Prüfung einen Material- oder Produktionsfehler aufweist.

[Händler & Kunden](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

Pflichten von Händler und Kunden: Um Garantieleistungen beanspruchen zu können, müssen Händler und Kunden Installationsanweisungen, Wartungshandbücher und Betriebshandbücher von Cascade sorgfältig beachten.

Für alle Reparaturen außer dem Ausbau und Ersatz defekter Teile muss der Kunde eine Freigabe von Cascade einholen. Unerlaubte Reparaturen oder Änderungen, der Einsatz von nicht von Cascade gelieferten Teilen, oder die Nichtbeachtung einer Installations-, Wartungs- oder Betriebsanweisung von Cascade führt automatisch zum Verlust jeden Garantieanspruchs.

Zur Information: Wenden Sie sich bei Fragen bezüglich Garantie, Installation oder Wartung an Ihren zuständigen Cascade Händler. Ihren zuständigen Händler oder weitere Produktinformationen erhalten Sie unter der Rufnummer **++49 2355 50 90 0**

[Ausschlüsse](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

Cascade garantiert nicht die Eignung seiner Produkte für eine bestimmte Anwendung. Cascade übernimmt keine Haftung für Verluste, Personen-, Sach- oder Vermögensschäden, oder resultierende Folgeschäden, die durch den Besitz oder Einsatz seiner Produkte entstanden sind. Die Cascade Garantie beinhaltet nicht Verschleiß, Abnutzung, außergewöhnliche Anwendungen oder normale oder vorgeschriebene Wartungsarbeiten.

Cascade Smart Solutions provides innovative material handling solutions for forklifts and unmanned automated systems (AGVs).

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Have a question about Cascade forks, attachments, or other technologies? Find an answer below or reach out to our team.

[Contact Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/contact-us)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [General](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

- [Company](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[General](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### General

- [Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3565196443)
- [How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-352949934)
- [What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-491972666)
- [What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3528550685)
- [Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1429131367)
- [How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1385769518)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Products

- [Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-585285702)
- [What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-4120159277)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 75 rental clamps available in North America.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

6 Months.

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3996748507)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/in/en-in/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

[Tuotteiden Takuut](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-203944854)

Cascade takaa tuotteidensa vastaavan tarjouksissaan, teknisissä tiedotteissaan, esitteissään ja hinnastoissaan julkaistuja spesifikaatioita.

- [Uudet Tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)
- [Uudelleenvalmistetut tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)
- [Mitä Cascade tekee?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

[Uudet Tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

[Uusien Cascade-tuotteiden](https://www.cascorp.com/products), mukaan lukien lisälaitteiden, mastojen, letkukelojen ja varaosien, takuuaika on 36 kuukautta asennuspäivästä.

[Uudelleenvalmistetut tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)

Cascaden tehdaskunnostettujentuotteiden takuuaika on 12 kuukautta asennuspäivästä.

[Mitä Cascade tekee?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

Cascade korjaa tai korvaa harkintansa mukaan minkä tahansa osan, joka Cascaden tarkastuksessa todetaan valmistusmateriaaliltaan tai laadultaan puutteelliseksi.

[Jälleenmyyjät & Asiakkaat](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

Jotta Cascaden takuu säilyisi voimassa, kauppiaan ja asiakkaan tulee tarkoin noudattaa Cascaden toimittamien asennus-, huolto- ja käyttöoppaiden ohjeita Cascade-laitteiden käytössä ja kunnossapidossa.

Asiakkaan täytyy hankkia Cascadelta valtuutus kaikille muille korjauksille kuin viallisten osien poistamiselle ja korvaamiselle uusilla osilla. Valtuuttamattomat korjaukset ja muutokset, muiden kuin Cascaden toimittamien osien käyttö ja Cascaden asennus-, huolto- ja käyttöoppaiden ohjeiden laiminlyönti johtaa takuun mitätöitymiseen.

**Tietoja takuusta, asennuksesta ja huollosta saat lähimmältä valtuutetulta Cascade-jälleenmyyjältä. Lähimmän jälleenmyyjän tiedot ja tietoja tuotteista saat soittamalla numeroon 09-836 1925.**

[Poissulkeminen](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

Cascade ei takaa tuotteidensa soveltuvuutta mihinkään tiettyyn käyttötarkoitukseen. Se ei myöskään ole vastuussa tuotteidensa hallussapidosta tai käytöstä johtuvista menetyksistä, henkilö- tai omaisuusvahingoista tai seuraamuksellisista vahingoista. Cascaden takuu ei korvaa käytöstä johtuvaa kulumista, epätavallisesta käytöstä johtuvia vaurioita eikä rutiinihuoltoa.

**CASCADE EI NÄISSÄ TAKUUEHDOISSA JA CASCADEN TILAUSVAHVISTUKSEN ETUSIVULLA OLEVASSA TUOTTEEN KUVAUKSESSA MAINITTUJEN TIETOJEN LISÄKSI ANNA MITÄÄN MUITA NIMENOMAISIA TAI KONKLUDENTTISIA TAKUITA, MUKAAN LUKIEN TAKUUT TIETTYYN KÄYTTÖTARKOITUKSEEN SOVELTUVUUDESTA.**

![Cascade AGV Smart Solutions](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-05/AGV3_Smartsolutions_475x360_1.png?itok=I1aaYPcv)

data.markdown:
[Aller au contenu principal](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#main-content)

- [Accueil](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr)

Foire aux Questions (FAQ)

Vous avez une question sur les fourches Cascade, les accessoires ou d'autres technologies ? Trouvez une réponse ci-dessous ou contactez notre équipe.

[Contactez-nous](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/contactez-nous)

Vignette

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Vignette

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [Accueil](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr)

- [Informations Générales](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-1363652011)
- [Des Produits](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-959989177)
- [Entreprise](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[Informations Générales](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### Informations Générales

- [Cascade répare-t-elle les accessoires?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Combien de temps prend le montage d’une pince <xyz>?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Comment calculer la capacité nette d’un chariot élévateur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Comment obtenir de la documentation sur l’entretien et les pièces?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [En tant qu’utilisateur final, peut-on se fournir en pièces directement auprès de Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [Est-il possible d’acheter les accessoires Cascade au terme de leur période de location?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [Les accessoires Cascade sont-ils fournis avec des instructions d'accrochage?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Peut-on se faire racheter les accessoires par Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [Qu'est-ce qu'un "accessoire pour chariot élévateur"?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [Que signifie "accrochage intégré"?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [Quels sont les besoins hydrauliques des accessoires Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2892245558)

[Cascade répare-t-elle les accessoires?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Oui. Pour en savoir plus, contactez votre représentant Cascade.

[Combien de temps prend le montage d’une pince <xyz>?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-832011141)

Demandez un produit et nous le fabriquerons. Cascade fabrique des produits personnalisés adaptés à vos besoins. Notre gamme de produits standard est détaillée dans la section [sur les produits Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/products) du présent site Web. Pour en savoir plus sur les produits personnalisés, contactez le responsable régional chargé de votre région.

[Comment calculer la capacité nette d’un chariot élévateur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Utilisez le [calculateur de capacité](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). En outre, les fabricants de chariots peuvent vous aider à calculer la valeur nette précise s'ils disposent des caractéristiques techniques précises des pinces.

[Comment obtenir de la documentation sur l’entretien et les pièces?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1778935468)

La documentation d'entretien et produit peut être gratuitement téléchargée. Il vous suffit de vous rendre dans la section [Rechercher des pièces et des manuels d'entretien,](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) sous Support. La documentation disponible sur ce site Web est continuellement mise à jour. Il est cependant possible que certains documents ne soient pas encore disponibles en ligne.

[En tant qu’utilisateur final, peut-on se fournir en pièces directement auprès de Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade vend ses pièces uniquement via des distributeurs OEM agréés. Nous ne pouvons pas vendre directement aux utilisateurs finals ni à des distributeurs/réparateurs indépendants. Prenez contact avec le distributeur de chariot élévateur agréé le plus proche pour toute requête de pièce et d'entretien.

[Est-il possible d’acheter les accessoires Cascade au terme de leur période de location?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Oui. Pour en savoir plus, contactez votre représentant Cascade.

[Les accessoires Cascade sont-ils fournis avec des instructions d'accrochage?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-831921626)

Oui. Les instructions d'accrochage sont également disponibles dans la section Rechercher des pièces et des manuels d'entretien, sous Instructions d'installation.

[Peut-on se faire racheter les accessoires par Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Cascade reconditionne les accessoires d'occasion. Reportez-vous à la section Accessoires reconditionnés du présent site Web.

[Qu'est-ce qu'un "accessoire pour chariot élévateur"?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3477565712)

L'expression "accessoire pour chariot élévateur" désigne généralement un équipement quelconque accroché à un chariot élévateur pour réaliser des opérations de manutention de charges, telles que le levage/l'abaissement, le prélèvement, la rotation, la poussée, le renversement, la préhension, le déplacement, etc. L'utilité ou l'adéquation à un usage d'un chariot élévateur est directement liée aux accessoires de manutention de charges dont il est équipé.

[Que signifie "accrochage intégré"?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-4070256962)

L'expression "accrochage intégré" signifie que le dispositif d'accrochage fait partie intégrante du tablier du mât.

[Quels sont les besoins hydrauliques des accessoires Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Les besoins hydrauliques sont détaillés dans la fiche technique de chaque accessoire. Pour en savoir plus sur les caractéristiques techniques, reportez-vous à la section sur les [produits](https://www.cascorp.com/products) du présent site Web.

[Des Produits](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Des Produits

- [Pourquoi une pince à bobines de papier est-elle équipée d’un bras court et d’un bras long?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Combien de temps l’installation d’un tireur-pousseur QFM nécessite-t-elle?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [Comment calculer les économies potentielles qu’il est possible de réaliser en utilisant des feuilles-palettes à la place de palettes?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [Comment fonctionne un tireur-pousseur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Est-il possible de tester un tireur-pousseur sans l’acheter?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Les tireurs-pousseurs peuvent-il manutentionner des palettes?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Qu’est-ce qu’un tireur-pousseur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [Quel est le coût d’une feuille-palette?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [Quels sont les types de feuilles-palettes disponibles?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-585285702)

[Pourquoi une pince à bobines de papier est-elle équipée d’un bras court et d’un bras long?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3562949537)

Les pinces à bobines de papier sont dotées de bras courts et longs afin de permettre la manutention des bobines en position horizontale.

[Combien de temps l’installation d’un tireur-pousseur QFM nécessite-t-elle?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1903672102)

L'installation des flexibles et des raccords nécessaires sur le chariot dure une heure tout au plus. Une fois le chariot préparé, l'accrochage d'un pousseur-tireur de charges dure environ cinq minutes.

[Comment calculer les économies potentielles qu’il est possible de réaliser en utilisant des feuilles-palettes à la place de palettes?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Gains nets = (nbre de conteneurs par jour x nbre de palettes par conteneur x nbre de jours de transport par an) x coût d'une palette + coût d'enlèvement d'une palette - coût d'une feuille-palette.

[Comment fonctionne un tireur-pousseur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Reportez-vous à la section Pousseurs-tireurs de charges du présent site, sous Produits Cascade.

[Est-il possible de tester un tireur-pousseur sans l’acheter?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Cascade propose des machines de démonstration. Contactez le directeur régional chargé de votre région pour obtenir des informations supplémentaires.

[Les tireurs-pousseurs peuvent-il manutentionner des palettes?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Oui, mais les plateaux doivent pouvoir être insérés dans le passage de fourches. Des plateaux de 15" x 48" permettent la manutention de la plupart des palettes. Reportez-vous à la section Pousseurs-tireurs de charges du présent site, dans la liste des produits Cascade.

[Qu’est-ce qu’un tireur-pousseur?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Un pousseur-tireur de charges est un accessoire permettant de tirer des charges sur feuilles-palettes jusque sur des plateaux, puis de pousser les charges pour les retirer des plateaux.

[Quel est le coût d’une feuille-palette?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-194125161)

Les prix sont variables. Prenez contact avec un fabricant de feuilles-palettes pour en savoir plus à ce sujet.

[Quels sont les types de feuilles-palettes disponibles?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-585285702)

Carton ondulé, carton ondulé à languette de préhension stratifiée, carton dur et plastique.

[Entreprise](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Entreprise

- [Cascade est-elle une entreprise américaine?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Dans quels pays Cascade est-elle implantée?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [Depuis combien de temps l’entreprise Cascade existe-t-elle?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2780666271)
- [Où se trouve le siège social de l’entreprise?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-78694544)

[Cascade est-elle une entreprise américaine?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade a été fondée à Portland dans l'Orégon (Etats-Unis) et s'est par la suite développée de par le monde. Elle dispose aujourd'hui d'un siège social européen situé à Verona, IT. Son siège social mondial se trouve toujours à Portland.

[Dans quels pays Cascade est-elle implantée?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-3996748507)

Cascade dispose d'installations de fabrication et de bureaux commerciaux dans le monde entier. Le siège social mondial de l'entreprise se trouve à Portland, dans l'Orégon (Etats-Unis) et son siège social européen à Almere, aux Pays-Bas. Cascade compte également des usines de fabrication aux Etats-Unis, au Canada, au Japon, aux Pays-Bas, au Royaume-Uni et en Chine. Cascade a également implanté des bureaux commerciaux et de distribution aux Etats-Unis, au Canada, au Japon, aux Pays-Bas, au Royaume-Uni, en Chine, en Finlande, en Suède, en France, en Allemagne, en Espagne, en Australie, en Nouvelle-Zélande, en Corée du Sud, en Afrique du Sud et à Singapour.

Pour en savoir plus sur les représentations Cascade dans le monde, rendez-vous dans la section International de ce site.

[Depuis combien de temps l’entreprise Cascade existe-t-elle?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-2780666271)

Cascade a été fondée en 1943 à Portland dans l'Orégon (Etats-Unis). Cette société n'était alors qu'une petit atelier de construction mécanique employant quatre personnes seulement.

[Où se trouve le siège social de l’entreprise?](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/faq#230548828-78694544)

Le siège social de Cascade Corporation se trouve à Fairview, dans l'Orégon. Fairview est située à proximité de Portland, sur la côte ouest des Etats-Unis d'Amérique.

[**À propos de nous**\\
\\
Apprenez qui nous sommes](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/products)

[**Carrières**\\
\\
Offres d'emploi](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/careers)

[**Garantie**\\
\\
Demande d'information / envoie d'une réclamation](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/warranty)

[Skip to main content](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#main-content)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi)

Usein Kysyttyä (FAQ)

Onko sinulla kysyttävää Cascade-haarukoista, lisälaitteista tai muista teknologioista? Etsi vastaus alta tai ota yhteyttä tiimiimme.

[Ota meihin yhteyttä](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/ota-meihin-yhteytta)

Pienoiskuva

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Pienoiskuva

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi)

- [Kenraali](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-1363652011)
- [Tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-959989177)
- [Yhtiö](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[Kenraali](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### Kenraali

- [Korjaako Cascade lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Kuinka kauan kestää <xyz>-pihtien asennus?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Kunnostaako Cascade käytössä olevia lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Laskeeko Cascade leasing-laitteilleen jäännösarvoa?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [Mitä integraalikiinnitys tarkoittaa?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [Mitä "trukin lisälaitteet" ovat?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [Miten voin laskea trukin nettokapasiteetin?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Miten voin tilata huoltoasiakirjoja ja varaosaluetteloita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [Mitkä ovat Cascade-lisälaitteiden hydrauliikkavaatimukset?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [Myykö Cascade käytettyjä lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [Toimittaako Cascade lisälaitteiden asennusohjeet?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [Valmistaako Cascade <xyz>-laitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Voinko loppukäyttäjänä ostaa Cascade-lisälaitteeseeni varaosat suoraan Cascadelta?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3565196443)

[Korjaako Cascade lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Kyllä. Lisätietoja saat numerosta 800-CASCADE (227-2233) (Pohjois-Amerikka) tai +31-36-5492911 (Eurooppa).

[Kuinka kauan kestää <xyz>-pihtien asennus?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-832011141)

Asennusohjeet löytyvät [huoltoasiakirjoista](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[Kunnostaako Cascade käytössä olevia lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Kyllä. Lisätietoja löydät tämän sivuston osiosta Uusiotuotetut lisälaitteet.

[Laskeeko Cascade leasing-laitteilleen jäännösarvoa?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Kyllä. Voimassa olevat leasing-laitteiden jäännösarvot saat soittamalla Cascaden oheistuotteiden ja -palveluiden osastolle numeroon (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[Mitä integraalikiinnitys tarkoittaa?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Integraalikiinnitys tarkoittaa sitä, että laitteen kiinnitys on osa maston kelkkaa.

[Mitä "trukin lisälaitteet" ovat?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Trukin lisälaitteella tarkoitetaan yleensä mitä tahansa trukkiin asennettava laitetta, jonka avulla kuormaa voidaan esim. nostaa tai laskea, puristaa, kääntää, työntää, vetää, kipata, poimia, siirtää jne. Lisälaitteilla on suuri vaikutus trukista saatavaan hyötyyn.

[Miten voin laskea trukin nettokapasiteetin?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-831921626)

Vaikkapa [kapasiteettilaskurilla](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Myös trukin valmistaja voi määrittää nettokapasiteetin pihdin teknisten tietojen perusteella.

[Miten voin tilata huoltoasiakirjoja ja varaosaluetteloita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Huoltoasiakirjat ja varaosaluettelot voit ladata ilmaiseksi [huoltoasiakirjoista](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) kohdasta Tuki. Pyrimme jatkuvasti päivittämään sivustoamme siten, että se sisältää kaikki uusimmat asiakirjat, mutta on mahdollista, että jotkin niistä eivät vielä ole saatavilla.

[Mitkä ovat Cascade-lisälaitteiden hydrauliikkavaatimukset?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Kunkin lisälaitteen hydrauliikkavaatimukset on eritelty laitteen teknisissä tiedoissa. Tämän sivuston kohdasta [Tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/eme/fi/products) löydät laitteiden tekniset tiedot.

[Myykö Cascade käytettyjä lisälaitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Cascade uusiotuottaa käytettyjä lisälaitteita. Lisätietoja löytyy tämän sivuston kohdasta Uusiotuotetut lisälaitteet.

[Toimittaako Cascade lisälaitteiden asennusohjeet?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Kyllä. Asennusohjeet löytyvät lisäksi tämän sivuston tuote- ja huoltoasiakirjoista, kohdasta Asennusohjeet.

[Valmistaako Cascade <xyz>-laitteita?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-995728063)

Mitä vain tarvitset, me voimme valmistaa sen sinulle. Cascade valmistaa räätälöityjä tuotteita asiakkaiden yksilöllisiin tarpeisiin. Tämän sivuston kohdasta [Cascade-tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/products) löydät vakiotuotevalikoimamme. Tietoa räätälöidyistä tuotteista saat paikalliselta aluepäälliköltä.

[Voinko loppukäyttäjänä ostaa Cascade-lisälaitteeseeni varaosat suoraan Cascadelta?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Cascade myy varaosia vain valtuutetuille trukkikauppiaille. Emme voi myydä varaosia loppukäyttäjille tai emmekä itsenäisille korjaamoille. Lisätietoja varaosista ja huoltopalveluista saat lähimmältä valtuutetulta trukkimyyjältä.

[Tuotteet](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Tuotteet

- [Mitä ovat push/pull-laitteet?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Miten push/pull-laite toimii?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [Miten voin laskea liukulavojen tuomat säästöt kuormalavoihin verrattuna?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2896752467)

[Mitä ovat push/pull-laitteet?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3562949537)

Push/pull-laitteet ovat lisälaitteita, jotka vetävät liukulavalla olevan kuorman kuormalevyille ja työntävät sen niiltä pois.

[Miten push/pull-laite toimii?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Katso Push/pull-laitteet kohdasta Cascade-tuotteet.

[Miten voin laskea liukulavojen tuomat säästöt kuormalavoihin verrattuna?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Nettosäästö = (konttien lkm päivässä x kuormalavojen lkm kontissa x lähetyspäivien lkm vuodessa) x kuormalavan hinta + kuormalavan hävittämiskustannukset - liukulavan hinta

[Yhtiö](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Yhtiö

- [Kuinka vanha yritys Cascade on?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Missä maissa Cascade toimii?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [Missä yhtiön pääkonttori sijaitsee?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2780666271)
- [Onko Cascade yhdysvaltalainen yritys?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-966841520)

[Kuinka vanha yritys Cascade on?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade perustettiin vuonna 1943 Portlandissa, Oregonin osavaltiossa, ja se oli aluksi pieni konepaja, jossa työskenteli vain neljä henkeä.

[Missä maissa Cascade toimii?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-3996748507)

Cascadella on tuotantolaitoksia ja myyntikonttoreita ympäri maailmaa. Yhtiön pääkonttori sijaitsee Portlandissa, Oregonin osavaltiossa, ja Euroopan pääkonttori Almeressa, Hollannissa. Cascadella on lisäksi tuotantolaitoksia Yhdysvalloissa, Kanadassa, Japanissa, Hollannissa, Iso-Britanniassa ja Kiinassa. Yhtiöllä on myyntikonttoreita ja jälleenmyyjiä Yhdysvalloissa, Kanadassa, Japanissa, Hollannissa, Iso-Britanniassa, Kiinassa, Suomessa, Ruotsissa, Ranskassa, Saksassa, Espanjassa, Australiassa, Uusi-Seelannissa, Etelä-Koreassa, Etelä-Afrikassa ja Singaporessa.

Lisätietoja Cascaden toimipaikoista ympäri maailmaa löytyy kohdasta Kansainvälinen.

[Missä yhtiön pääkonttori sijaitsee?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-2780666271)

Cascade Corporationin pääkonttori sijaitsee Fairviewssä, Oregonin osavaltiossa. Fairview sijaitsee Yhdysvaltain länsirannikolla, vähän matkan päässä Portlandin kaupungista.

[Onko Cascade yhdysvaltalainen yritys?](https://www.cascorp.com/fi/fi/faq#230548828-966841520)

Cascade perustettiin Portlandissa, Oregonin osavaltiossa, ja se on kasvanut maailmanlaajuiseksi yhtiöksi, jonka Euroopan pääkonttori sijaitsee Hollannin Almeressa. Yhtiön pääkonttori on edelleen Portlandissa.

# Wie können wir Ihnen helfen?

In einer Welt vielfältiger logistischer Herausforderungen, bietet Cascade vielseitige Anbaugeräte, Gabelzinken, Hubgerüste und verwandte Technologien zur Steigerung der Produktivität in der gesamten Lieferkette. Wir arbeiten mit unseren Kunden zusammen, um ihnen die Ausrüstung anzubieten, die sie benötigen um ihre Transportaufgaben zu meistern und bieten ihnen zusätzlich zuverlässigen Service vor Ort.

[Mehr erfahren](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/products)

[![Cascade AGVs](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2022-07/PromoCard_AGV.png?itok=UKRY7aOA)**AGV-Anbaugeräte**](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/agv)

[![Cascade ordering parts](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-05/PromoCardComp_OrderParts.png?itok=rwYdwP1W)**Ersatzteile bestellen**](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/parts)

[![Cascade technical publications and manuals](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2022-07/PromoCardComp_TechManuals.png?itok=V36-p5qc)**Technische Handbücher**](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature?literature_search%5B0%5D=language%3Ade)

[![Rental](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-06/PromoCardComp_RentalEquip.png?itok=VMmjYNKu)**Vermietung**](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/rent)

Cascade ist weltweit führend in Qualitätsanbaugeräten,

Gabelzinken, Hubgerüsten und Zubehör für Gabelstapler und automatisierte Fahrzeuge!

[Produkte](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/products) [Entdecken Sie unsere Anwendungslösungen](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/industries)

Intelligente Lösungen

Cascade Electrix™

elektrische Anbaugeräte für fahrerlose Transportsysteme

[Mehr erfahren](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/electric-forklift)

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-05/ElectricsCTA5050.png?itok=ZvG4HcKL)

SMARTE LÖSUNGEN

Hochwertige Transportlösung für maximale Sicht und Präzision

Sensor-Gabelzinken sind mit mehreren Sensoren und einer WLAN-Kamera ausgestattet, die den Sichtbereich des Staplerfahrers erweitern und ein hochpräzises, effizientes Arbeiten ermöglichen.

[Erfahren Sie mehr](https://www.cascorp.com/de/de/sensorforks)

33 Standorte weltweit

Durch unser Netz an weltweiten Produktionswerken und Standorten, haben Cascade -Mitarbeiter die Möglichkeit länderübergreifend zusammen zu arbeiten, um die Bedürfnisse der Kunden überall und jederzeit zu erfüllen. Gleichzeitig bieten Sie unseren Kunden Service und Unterstützung vor Ort.
