[Skip to main content](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#main-content)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Have a question about Cascade forks, attachments, or other technologies? Find an answer below or reach out to our team.

[Contact Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/contact-us)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz)

- [General](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-1363652011)
- [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-959989177)
- [Company](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[General](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### General

- [Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3565196443)
- [How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-352949934)
- [What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-491972666)
- [What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3528550685)
- [Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1429131367)
- [How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1385769518)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-959989177)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 75 rental clamps available in North America.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

[What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-585285702)

6 Months.

[What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-4120159277)

The warranty on remanufactured product is six months following date of installation.

[Company](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2780666271)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/nz/en-nz/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

# Smarta lösningar för gaffeltruckar och AGV

Om du letar efter en revolutionerande materialhanteringslösning, behöver du inte leta längre. Cascades smarta lösningar är enkla att integrera i befintliga arbetsflöden och är lätta att använda. För att uppnå ökad effektivitet krävs endast en kort utbildning.

- [How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3565196443)
- [How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-352949934)
- [What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-491972666)
- [What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3528550685)
- [Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1429131367)
- [How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1385769518)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Products

- [Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-585285702)
- [What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-4120159277)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 75 rental clamps available in North America.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

[What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-585285702)

6 Months.

[What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-4120159277)

The warranty on remanufactured product is six months following date of installation.

[Company](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2780666271)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

# Comment pouvons-nous vous aider?

Dans un monde de plusieurs défis logistiques Cascade propose des accessoires polyvalents, des fourches, des mâts et des technologies associées pour améliorer la productivité tout au long de la chaîne d'approvisionnement. Nous collaborons avec nos clients pour leur fournir les outils dont ils ont besoin pour travailler correctement et offrir une assistance locale fiable.

[En savoir plus](https://www.cascorp.com/fr/fr/products)

# 지게차/AGV 스마트 솔루션

캐스케이드 스마트 솔루션은 지게차 및 AGV(무인 자동화 시스템)에 혁신적인 화물 처리 솔루션을 제공합니다.

[문의하기](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/munuihagi)

- [AGV 솔루션](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-2048063848)

- [카메라 및 센서 포크](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-3735054610)
- [포크세터 (Fork setter)](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-2960580599)
- [이동식 무게 측정 (저울 포크)](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-1441536158)

[AGV 솔루션](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-2048063848)

AGV 솔루션

당사의 부착물은 AGV를 최대한 활용하도록 설계되었습니다.

[AGV 솔루션 보기](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/agv)

![Cascade AGV Smart Solutions](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-05/AGV3_Smartsolutions_475x360_1.png?itok=I1aaYPcv)

[전동 지게차용 어태치먼트](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-2144205868)

전기 부착물

Cascade의 전기식 부착물로 최대 효율성을 발휘하십시오.

[전기 첨부 파일 보기](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/electric-forklift)

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/import_images/AGV_Electrix-1.jpg?itok=5Qwir7X4)

[카메라 및 센서 포크](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-3735054610)

카메라 및 센서 포크

창고 응용 프로그램, 높은 적재 작업, 저조도 환경 등에 이상적입니다.

[센서 포크 및 카메라 포크 보기](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/forksplus)

![Cascade Camera and Sensor Forklift Fork](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2024-06/SENSOR%20FORKS_b%20series.png?itok=3v_x4XPY)

[포크세터 (Fork setter)](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-2960580599)

Forksetter™

특수 센서를 사용하여 포크 사이의 거리를 읽으십시오.

[스마트 옵션 및 액세서리 보기](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/en/options)

![Cascade - Forksetter: efficient automatic fork positioner for forklifts ](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2023-05/Banner_ForkSetter_475x360.png?itok=q9hR-mhA)

[이동식 무게 측정 (저울 포크)](https://www.cascorp.com/ko/ko/smartSolutions#4257225834-1441536158)

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/coh_x_large/public/2022-07/NEWWeigh-Forks.png?itok=GuR543Vb)

### Generale

- [Cascade consente la permuta di attrezzature esistenti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Cascade fornisce istruzioni per il montaggio dell'attrezzatura?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [Cascade costruisce <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2780666271)
- [Cascade riconosce valori residui per attrezzature in leasing?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-707042120)
- [Cascade ripara attrezzature esistenti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3948244334)
- [Cascade vende attrezzature usate?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-732607490)
- [Che cosa significa montaggio integrale?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-957188631)
- [Come si calcola la capacità netta di un carrello elevatore?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-4105003566)
- [Che cos'è una "attrezzatura del carrello elevatore"?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1068480055)
- [Come si ordinano i manuali di servizio e delle parti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3033183916)
- [Gli utilizzatori finali di un'attrezzatura Cascade possono acquistare i ricambi direttamente da Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1382822471)
- [Quali sono i requisiti idraulici delle attrezzature Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2273334391)
- [Quando tempo occorre per installare una <xyz> pinza?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2038919182)

[Cascade consente la permuta di attrezzature esistenti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Sì. Per ulteriori informazioni, visitare la sezione Attrezzature rigenerate di questo sito.

[Cascade fornisce istruzioni per il montaggio dell'attrezzatura?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3996748507)

Sì. Le istruzioni di montaggio sono disponibili anche nella sezione Cerca manuali di servizio e parti di questo sito, sotto Manuale di installazione.

[Cascade costruisce <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2780666271)

Diteci cosa e noi lo costruiremo. Cascade costruisce prodotti personalizzati specifici per esigenze diverse. La nostra linea di prodotti standard è descritta nella sezione [Prodotti Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/products) di questo sito. Per ulteriori informazioni sui prodotti personalizzati, contattare il Capo area locale.

[Cascade riconosce valori residui per attrezzature in leasing?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-707042120)

Sì. Per informazioni sui valori residui correnti, contattare Cascade Allied Products & Services al numero (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[Cascade ripara attrezzature esistenti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3948244334)

Sì. Per ulteriori informazioni chiamare il numero 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in America settentrionale o il numero +31-36-5492911 in Europa.

[Cascade vende attrezzature usate?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-732607490)

Cascade rigenera attrezzature usate. Vedere la sezione Attrezzature rigenerate di questo sito.

[Che cosa significa montaggio integrale?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-957188631)

Montaggio integrale significa che il montaggio è parte integrante della piastra portaforche del montante.

[Come si calcola la capacità netta di un carrello elevatore?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-4105003566)

Utilizzando il [calcolatore di capacità](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Inoltre, se le specifiche delle pinze sono note, i fabbricanti del carrello possono aiutare a determinare il valore netto preciso.

[Che cos'è una "attrezzatura del carrello elevatore"?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1068480055)

Con "attrezzatura del carrello elevatore" generalmente si intende qualsiasi apparecchiatura montata sul carrello elevatore che lo abiliti ad eseguire funzioni di movimentazione dei carichi, come sollevare/abbassare, afferrare, ruotare, spingere, tirare, prelevare, spostare, ecc. L'utilità o meno di un carrello elevatore dipende direttamente dalle sue attrezzature per la movimentazione dei carichi.

[Come si ordinano i manuali di servizio e delle parti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3033183916)

I manuali di servizio e delle parti possono essere scaricati gratuitamente. Vedere la sezione [Cerca manuali di servizio e parti](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) sotto Supporto. Questo sito viene costantemente aggiornato con tutti i manuali più recenti, tuttavia è possibile che alcuni di essi non siano ancora online.

[Gli utilizzatori finali di un'attrezzatura Cascade possono acquistare i ricambi direttamente da Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1382822471)

Cascade vende ricambi solo attraverso rivenditori OEM autorizzati. Non possiamo vendere agli utilizzatori finali né a rivenditori di ricambi indipendenti. Per informazioni su ricambi e assistenza, contattare il rivenditore di carrelli elevatori autorizzato più vicino.

[Quali sono i requisiti idraulici delle attrezzature Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2273334391)

I requisiti idraulici sono dettagliati nella scheda tecnica di ciascuna attrezzatura. Per le specifiche, vedere la sezione [Prodotti](https://www.cascorp.com/products) di questo sito.

[Quando tempo occorre per installare una <xyz> pinza?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2038919182)

Le istruzioni per l'installazione si trovano sotto [Cerca manuali di servizio e delle parti](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[Prodotti](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Prodotti

- [Perché una pinza per bobine di carta ha bracci lunghi e corti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Che cos'è un Push/Pull?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [Che tipi di foglio esistono?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [Come funziona un Push/Pull?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Come si calcola il risparmio che può derivare dall'uso del foglio rispetto ai pallet?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [È possibile provare un Push/Pull senza acquistarlo?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Quanto costa il foglio?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1968785805)

[Perché una pinza per bobine di carta ha bracci lunghi e corti?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3562949537)

Le pinze per bobine di carta hanno bracci lunghi e corti per movimentare bobine in posizione orizzontale.

[Che cos'è un Push/Pull?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Un Push/Pull è un'attrezzatura che carica/scarica carichi su foglio dai pancali.

[Che tipi di foglio esistono?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Fibra di cartone ondulato, foglio di fibra di cartone ondulato con aletta laminata, fibra di cartone solido e plastica.

[Come funziona un Push/Pull?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Vedere la sezione Push/Pull di questo sito sotto Prodotti Cascade.

[Come si calcola il risparmio che può derivare dall'uso del foglio rispetto ai pallet?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Risparmio netto = (n. container al giorno x n. pallet per container x n. giorni spedizione all'anno) x costo pallet + costo smaltimento pallet - costo foglio

[È possibile provare un Push/Pull senza acquistarlo?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Cascade mette a disposizione alcune unità a scopo dimostrativo. Per ulteriori informazioni contattare il Capo area locale.

[Quanto costa il foglio?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1968785805)

I prezzi variano. Per informazioni dettagliate, contattare i produttori di fogli.

[Azienda](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### Azienda

- [Cascade è un'azienda americana?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Da quando esiste Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Dove si trova la sede centrale dell'azienda?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [In quali paesi opera Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1778935468)

[Cascade è un'azienda americana?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade è stata fondata a Portland, Oregon, negli Stati Uniti e si è successivamente espansa a livello internazionale. La sede centrale europea si trova ad Verona, Italia. La sede centrale internazionale rimane a Portland.

[Da quando esiste Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-832011141)

Cascade è stata fondata nel 1943 a Portland, Oregon, negli Stati Uniti, come piccola officina meccanica con solo quattro dipendenti.

[Dove si trova la sede centrale dell'azienda?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-2696958369)

La sede centrale di Cascade Corporation si trova a Fairview, Oregon. Fairview è a poca distanza da Portland sulla costa occidentale degli Stati Uniti.

[In quali paesi opera Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/it/it/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Cascade ha uffici di produzione e vendita in tutto il mondo. La sede centrale internazionale è a Portland, Oregon, USA, e la sede centrale europea è ad Almere, Paesi Bassi. Cascade dispone inoltre di impianti di produzione in USA, Canada, Giappone, Paesi Bassi, Regno Unito e Cina, con uffici di vendita e distribuzione in USA, Canada, Giappone, Paesi Bassi, Regno Unito, Cina, Finlandia, Svezia, Francia, Germania, Spagna, Australia, Nuova Zelanda, Corea del Sud, Sud Africa e Singapore.

Per ulteriori informazioni sugli uffici Cascade nel mondo, vedere l'area Internazionale del sito.

[Product Warranties](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-203944854)

Cascade warrants its products to conform to published specifications as found in its quotations, specification sheets, brochures and price lists.

- [New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)
- [Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)
- [Certified Used Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-1591881853)
- [What We Do](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

[New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

[New Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products)—consisting of attachments, forks, masts, hose reels and genuine Cascade parts—are warranted for 36 months following date of installation. Construction attachments are warranted for 12 months following date of installation.

[Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)

[Cascade Remanufactured products](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured) are warranted for 12 months following date of installation.

[Certified Used Products](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-1591881853)

Cascade Certified Used products are warranted for 6 months following date of installation.

[What We Do](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

Cascade will repair or replace, at its option, any part that a Cascade inspection reveals to be defective in materials or workmanship.

[Dealers & Customers](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

To preserve Cascade's Warranty, Dealers and Customers must carefully follow applicable Cascade Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides when maintaining and operating Cascade equipment. Customers must obtain written authorization for repairs or maintenance other than removal or replacement of defective parts.

Unauthorized repairs, modifications, or alterations, use of parts not provided by Cascade, or failure to follow Cascade's Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides will result in loss of Warranty and Customers assumption of all liability resulting from the repair, maintenance, modification or alteration.

**End Users: for information on warranty, installation, or service, contact the nearest authorized Cascade Dealer. For the name of the nearest Dealer or for product information, call 1-800-CASCADE(227-2233).**

[Exclusions](https://www.cascorp.com/ca/en-ca/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

Cascade assumes no responsibility for loss, damage or injury to person or property, or for consequential damages, resulting from the possession or use of its products. Cascade's warranty does not cover wear, tear, abnormal applications, normal or scheduled maintenance.

**THERE ARE NO WARRANTIES EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING ANY WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE WHICH EXTEND BEYOND THOSE STATED IN THIS WARRANTY AND THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION ON THE FACE OF CASCADE'S ORDER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT**.

[Skip to main content](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#main-content)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Have a question about Cascade forks, attachments, or other technologies? Find an answer below or reach out to our team.

[Contact Cascade](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/contact-us)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/475x360/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=NolVo9Vs)

Thumbnail

![](https://www.cascorp.com/sites/default/files/styles/64x64/public/2023-06/FAQ.jpg?h=338c276e&itok=Jq44_XqA)

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au)

- [General](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-1363652011)
- [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-959989177)
- [Company](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

[General](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-1363652011)

### General

- [Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3235888736)
- [Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-832011141)
- [Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2696958369)
- [Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1778935468)
- [As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1148764138)
- [How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3184137679)
- [How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-831921626)
- [Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1838563319)
- [How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3477565712)
- [What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-4070256962)
- [What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2892245558)
- [What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-995728063)
- [Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3565196443)
- [How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-352949934)
- [What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-491972666)
- [What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3528550685)
- [Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1429131367)
- [How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1385769518)

[Does Cascade sell used attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3235888736)

Cascade remanufactures used attachments. See, [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade make <xyz's>?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-832011141)

You name it, we can make it. Cascade makes custom products to fit your needs. Our standard product line is detailed in the [Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site. For information about custom products, call your local Territory Manager.

[Does Cascade allow trade-in of existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2696958369)

Yes. For more information, visit [Remanufactured Attachments](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured).

[Does Cascade allow residual values for leased attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1778935468)

Yes. For current lease residuals, contact Cascade Allied Products & Services at (800) CASCADE (227-2233).

[As an end-user of a Cascade attachment, can I buy parts directly from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1148764138)

Cascade only sells parts thru Authorized OEM Dealers. We cannot sell to end users or independent repair dealers. Please contact your nearest authorized lift truck dealer for parts and service.

[How do I order service and parts literature?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3184137679)

Service and parts literature are available as a free download. Just go to [Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature). We are constantly working to update this site with all our current literature, however, some may not yet be online.

[How do I calculate net capacity on my lift truck?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-831921626)

Use the [Capacity Calculator](https://www.cascorp.com/capacity-calculator). Also, if given clamp specifications, truck manufacturers can help to find the accurate net rating.

[Does Cascade supply mounting instructions for the attachment?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1838563319)

Yes. Mounting instructions are also available in the [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature) section on this site, under Installation Instructions.

[How long should it take to install a <xyz> clamp?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3477565712)

Installation instructions can be found under [Product & Service Literature](https://www.cascorp.com/serviceliterature).

[What are the hydraulic requirements for Cascade attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-4070256962)

Hydraulic requirements are detailed in the specification sheet for each attachment. For specifications, see the [Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products) section of this site.

[What does integral mount mean?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2892245558)

Integral mount means that the mounting is an integral part of the mast carriage.

[What is a "lift truck attachment"?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-995728063)

"Lift truck attachment" generally refers to any equipment that is mounted on a lift truck, enabling it to perform load-handling functions such as raise/lower, clamp, rotate, push, pull, dump, pick, move, etc. The utility or usefulness of a lift truck is directly related to its load-handling attachments.

[Why does a Paper Roll Clamp have long and short arms?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3565196443)

Paper Roll Clamps have long and short arms to handle rolls in the bilge (horizontal) position.

[How do I choose the right forklift attachment or forks for my specific application?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-352949934)

Our website makes it easy. Browse available products by [industry](https://www.cascorp.com/industries) or [product family](https://www.cascorp.com/products). Need help? [Reach out to our support team](https://www.cascorp.com/sales) or review product-specific materials for more information.

[What are the different types of forklift attachments available and how do they enhance productivity?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-491972666)

From Clamps to heavy handlers, AGV/AGF solutions, and versatile Rotators, Cascade has a forklift attachment for every material handling need. Attachments built specifically for your application provide numerous productivity enhancements:

- Versatility – our attachments enable drivers to handle various materials and perform diverse tasks, eliminating the need for additional machinery or manual labor.
- Streamlined Processes - attachments like Paper Roll Clamps, Pallet Forks, and Rotators facilitate quick and efficient loading, unloading, stacking, and transportation of goods, saving time and reducing manual labor.
- Multiple Load Capacities - with numerous load capacities, Cascade forklift attachments enable the handling of large, small, and specialized loads, reducing the need for multiple trips or additional equipment.
- Damage Reduction - attachments designed for specific material handling needs improve operator comfort and minimize errors.

[What are the benefits of investing in high-quality forklift attachments or forks from Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3528550685)

- Innovation: Founded in 1943, Cascade Corporation is known for its continuous innovation and investment in research and development. We are committed to staying at the forefront of industry advancements and introducing new technologies and features that enhance forklift attachment performance. By investing in Cascade's high-quality attachments, businesses can access cutting-edge solutions and stay ahead of the competition.
- Global Reach and Support: Cascade Corporation has a global presence and a vast network of dealers and service providers. This ensures that businesses can access our products and benefit from reliable after-sales support, including maintenance, repairs, and spare parts availability.
- Reliability and Durability: Cascade Corporation is renowned for our commitment to producing robust and durable forklift attachments. High-quality materials and rigorous manufacturing standards ensure that our forks and attachments are built to withstand the demanding conditions of material handling operations. This reliability translates to fewer breakdowns, reduced downtime, and increased productivity.

[Can Cascade forklift attachments be customized or modified to meet my specific requirements?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1429131367)

Absolutely. We take pride in our custom engineered solutions. [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/specialty).

[How do I maintain and care for my forklift attachments or forks to ensure longevity?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1385769518)

Please watch the video below or [reach out](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus) with any questions.

[Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-959989177)

### Products

- [Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3562949537)
- [Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1903672102)
- [How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2896752467)
- [What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3059615629)
- [Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1081668544)
- [Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3785706822)
- [Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1968785805)
- [What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-194125161)
- [What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-585285702)
- [What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-4120159277)

[Can I try a product without buying it?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3562949537)

We offer units for demo. [Contact your local Territory Manager for more information](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/contactus).

[Carton Clamps](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1903672102)

Can a Carton Clamp handle pallets?

- Yes, but the platens must be able to fit in the fork pocket. 15" x 48" platens will handle most pallets. See the Push/Pull section of this site under Cascade Products.

How do I select the right Carton Clamp for my specific load sizes and weights?

- [Learn more here](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/capacitycalcintro).

[How do I calculate the savings potential of slip sheets over pallets?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2896752467)

Net savings **=** (# containers per day **x** # pallets per container **x** #shipping days per year) **x** pallet cost **+** pallet disposal cost **-** slipsheet cost

[What slip sheet styles are available?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3059615629)

Corrugated fiberboard, corrugated fiberboard sheet with laminated tab, solid fiberboard and plastic.

[Does Cascade repair existing attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1081668544)

Yes. Call 800-CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe for more information.

[Does Cascade rent attachments?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3785706822)

Yes. Cascade has about 75 rental clamps available in North America.  For more information, call the Remanufacturing department at (800) CASCADE (227-2233) in North America or +31-36-5492911 in Europe.

[Can I get driver training?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1968785805)

Call your local Territory Manager for information about driver training.  Cascade supports the training programs offered by most of the world's major lift truck OEMs. Contact your OEM for more information about OEM training.

[What is Cascade's warranty policy?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-194125161)

See our warranty policy under [Support](https://www.cascorp.com/warranty).

[What is the warranty on a factory certified used unit?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-585285702)

6 Months.

[What is the warranty on Cascade Remanufactured Product?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-4120159277)

The warranty on remanufactured product is six months following date of installation.

[Company](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#4257225834-1141178869)

### Company

- [What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1662380784)
- [Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3996748507)
- [How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2780666271)

[What countries does Cascade operate in?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-1662380784)

Cascade has [manufacturing and sales offices worldwide](https://www.cascorp.com/americas/en/locations). Cascade has manufacturing plants in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, and China. Cascade maintains Sales and Distribution offices in the USA, Canada, Japan, The Netherlands, United Kingdom, China, Finland, Sweden, France, Germany, Spain, Australia, New Zealand, South Korea, South Africa, Singapore and Brazil.

[Is Cascade an American company?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-3996748507)

​​​​Cascade was founded in Portland, Oregon, USA and has expanded around the globe, with European headquarters in Verona, Italy. World headquarters remain in Portland.

[How old is Cascade?](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/faq#230548828-2780666271)

​​​Cascade was founded in 1943 in Portland, Oregon, USA as a small machine shop employing just four people.

\\
Learn about who we are](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/About)

[**Careers**\\

# Warranty Support

Learn more about the Cascade PERFORMANCE™+ Progam [here](https://www.cascorp.com/en-au/performanceplus1).

- [Home](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au)

### Support Contacts

- [Australia](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#230548828-2587847652)

[Australia](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#230548828-2587847652)

#### Kody Porta

Warranty Administrator

Cascade Australia

36 Kiln Street

DarraQLD4076

Australia

[Office:07 3373 7300](tel:07 3373 7300) [Email:auswarranty@cascorp.com](tel:auswarranty@cascorp.com)

- [Product Warranties](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-203944854)
- [Dealers & Customers](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

[Product Warranties](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-203944854)

Cascade warrants its products to conform to published specifications as found in its quotations, specification sheets, brochures and price lists.

- [New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)
- [Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)
- [What We Do](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

[New Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-1565575875)

[New Cascade Products](https://www.cascorp.com/products)—consisting of attachments, forks, masts, hose reels and genuine Cascade parts—are warranted for 36 months following date of installation.

[Remanufactured Products](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-2696585224)

[Cascade Remanufactured products](https://www.cascorp.com/remanufactured) are warranted for 12 months following date of installation.

[What We Do](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-649287830)

Cascade will repair or replace, at its option, any part that a Cascade inspection reveals to be defective in materials or workmanship.

[Dealers & Customers](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-1270242748)

To preserve Cascade's Warranty, Dealers and Customers must carefully follow applicable Cascade Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides when maintaining and operating Cascade equipment. Customers must obtain written authorization for repairs or maintenance other than removal or replacement of defective parts.

Unauthorized repairs, modifications, or alterations, use of parts not provided by Cascade, or failure to follow Cascade's Installation Instructions, Service Manuals and Operator Guides will result in loss of Warranty and Customers assumption of all liability resulting from the repair, maintenance, modification or alteration.

**End Users: for information on warranty, installation, or service, contact the nearest authorized Cascade Dealer.**

[Exclusions](https://www.cascorp.com/au/en-au/warranty#4257225834-3689312652)

Cascade assumes no responsibility for loss, damage or injury to person or property, or for consequential damages, resulting from the possession or use of its products. Cascade's warranty does not cover wear, tear, abnormal applications, normal or scheduled maintenance.

**THERE ARE NO WARRANTIES EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED INCLUDING ANY WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE WHICH EXTEND BEYOND THOSE STATED IN THIS WARRANTY AND THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION ON THE FACE OF CASCADE'S ORDER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT**.

[Download our Performance+ Warranty Pledge](https://webcdnprd.cascorp.com/import_downloads/PerformancePlus3Year_AU_07-31-18.pdf)
